resources.string: Camera access will be needed in order to scan the QR code on the computer screen for easy and seamless connection. You can download the desktop application at [LINK]

Press the top section to bring up the NEXT slide. Press the bottom section to go back to the PREVIOUS one.
If nothing happens when pressing either section, ensure that the presentation window on your computer is selected.

Press \‚ÄùTurn ON Background Service" to use the UP/DOWN volume keys instead of the smartphone screen.

When ON, the Background Service will deactivate adjustment of media and ringtone volume.
